documents.title: Dashboard Requirements
documents.content: Build browser-based dashboard hosted on GitHub Pages with 7 tabs: Dashboard, YouTube, New Business, Investments, Tools, Research, Audits

documents.title: Work Tracker Requirements
documents.content: Build work tracker to monitor all agent activity 24/7 with 5 tabs: Live Activity, Audit Reports, Ralph Chains, Agents, Settings

documents.title: YouTube Outlier Research
documents.content: Research YouTube outliers from ZMDE Gaming and StevenSongIRL channels using viewstats.com Pro Tools

documents.title: Morning Brief Widget
documents.content: Added Morning Brief widget to Dashboard showing high-priority opportunities, YouTube outliers, audit grades, watchlist, and research updates
